version_description: • we squished some bugs
• we squished some bugs
• we squished some bugs

• Fixed bug that occurs when Restoring an existing subscription

New updates in previous version:
• Search to add your own products! Looking for something that’s not on our list? Just use the Search bar to add anything from Lego through to GPU graphic cards!
• Added a new, shiny My Alerts section - all your alerts in one place
• Support for iPhone X and iPhone 8

• Fixed bug that occurs when Restoring an existing subscription

New updates in previous version:
• Search to add your own products! Looking for something that’s not on our list? Just use the Search bar to add anything from Lego through to GPU graphic cards!
• Added a new, shiny My Alerts section - all your alerts in one place
• Support for iPhone X and iPhone 8

• Fixed bug that occurs when Restoring an existing subscription

New updates in previous version:
• Search to add your own products! Looking for something that’s not on our list? Just use the Search bar to add anything from Lego through to GPU graphic cards!
• Added a new, shiny My Alerts section - all your alerts in one place
• Support for iPhone X and iPhone 8

We've listened to your feedback, and added a new feature we think you'll like...

* Set the maximum price for your alerts *
Just enter the maximum price you're willing to pay for a product, and you'll only get alerts when it's in stock at that price or less!
Great for people looking to buy a new video card, like the NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080, at the lowest possible price (RRP)!
